[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias=”home-11″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710931764588{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”424″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Quality Group (I) is a leading indigenous contributor in Biomass Supply Chain Management and a producer of Biomass pellets/Briquettes. Our endeavor is to conserve the environment by reducing pollution and carbon footprint. The group has served the farmers and industry with amicable Bioenergy and Biomass solutions through acceptable business models; while enabling the farmers to gain entrepreneurial acumen.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]With its vast network for Biomass aggregation and professional yard management program, the group has undisputable track record as a dependable and committed supplier to marquee corporate customers.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]Read More[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”center” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710931809940{padding-top: 80px !important;background-color: #fff1e8 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our Products

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Biomass Supply Chain Management — Briquettes — Pellets

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

1) Biomass Supply chain management:

a) Aggregation of Biomass

b) Yard Management

c) Shredding of Biomass

d) Logistics to the customer’s site

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

2) Manufacturing:

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1712225933284{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #fff1e8 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” css=”.vc_custom_1712225167275{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1712225249444{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”462″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1712229578860{padding-top: 7px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Briquettes

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Size (OD) 70 mm to 90 mm
GCV 3500 – 4000 Kcal/kg
Ash 8-10 %
Moisture 10-12 %

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” css=”.vc_custom_1712225757060{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1712225765706{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”463″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1712229586883{padding-top: 7px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Pellets

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Size (OD) 16 mm to 25 mm
GCV 3500 – 4000 Kcal/kg
Ash 5 – 10%
Moisture 8 – 12%

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”center” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710959064739{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Who We Cater

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710946603285{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][qode_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][qode_elements_holder_item vertical_alignment=”middle” horizontal_alignment=”center” advanced_animations=”no” item_padding=”0 35px”]

<title>India's Leading Biomass Manufacturers and Suppliers Company | Qualitybio</title>
<meta name="description" content="At Qualitybio, we specialize in the production and supply of high-quality biomass products, including briquettes, pellets, and other sustainable biofuel." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:type" content="article" />

<meta property="og:description" content="At Qualitybio, we specialize in the production and supply of high-quality biomass products, including briquettes, pellets, and other sustainable biofuel." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://qualitybio.in/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Quality Bioenergy" />
